org.vaadin.addons.criteriacore

Class LoggerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vaadin.addons.criteriacore.LoggerUtils

  • public class LoggerUtils
extends Object
    Log an exception trace to the log file. Useful to print a "where called trace", as in 
    LoggerUtils.logException(logger, new Exception("where is this called from");
    Author:
    jflamy
